LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.SmartStore.CommonExportProviders
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export product, category, manufacturer and other data.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Exports.SmartStoreCategoryCsv
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export category data in CSV format.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Exports.SmartStoreCategoryXml
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export category data in XML format.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Exports.SmartStoreCustomerCsv
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export customer data in CSV format.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Exports.SmartStoreCustomerXml
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export customer data in XML format.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Exports.SmartStoreManufacturerCsv
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export manufacturer data in CSV format.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Exports.SmartStoreManufacturerXml
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export manufacturer data in XML format.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Exports.SmartStoreOrderCsv
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export order data in CSV format.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Exports.SmartStoreOrderXml
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export order data in XML format.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Exports.SmartStoreProductCsv
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export product data in CSV format.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Exports.SmartStoreProductXml
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export product data in XML format.

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Exports.SmartStoreNewsSubscriptionCsv
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to export newsletter subscriber data in CSV format.

LocaleResource.Name: DemoModeHint
LocaleResource.Value: Please take to account this plugin runs in demo mode and only 20 records will be exported. To buy a license for this plugin please visit the SmartStore Community Marketplace.
